natives_siberian = {
	graphical_culture = inuitgfx
	color = { 127  255  255 }
	icon = 4
	
	unit = mongol_bow
	
	provinces = {
		
		### START trade_company_white_sea from 00_trade_companies.txt ###
		
			313 1776 1777 1955 1958 2425 3282 3284 3285 4122 4257 4258 5648 5649 5650 5673 5674 5675 5677 5678 1072 7865 7866 4129 4256 4259 5647 5652 309 1652 7496
		
		### END trade_company_white_sea ###
		
		### START trade_company_siberia from 00_trade_companies.txt ###
		
			479 480 716 1034 1035 1036 1037 1038 1039 1040 1041 1042 1043 1044 1045 1046 1047 1051 1052 1054 1055 1056 1057 1058 1059 1060 1061 1062 1063 1064 1065 1066 1067 1068 1069 1070 1071 1073 1074 1075 1076 1078 1080 1780 1781 1782 2102 2438 2439 2440 2441 2442 2443 2445 2446 2354 2357 2369 2427 2428 2429 2430 2431 2432 2433 2434 2436 2437 2435 4686 4687 4688 4689 4690 4691 4692 
		
		### END trade_company_siberia ###
		
		1032 # The Kurils
		1033 # Sakhalin
		
	}
}
